benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class CrimeDetailActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeActivityBase<CrimeSummaryDetailed>
        • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeDetailActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrimeDataLoadingListener<CrimeSummaryDetailed>, KodUtvaruLoadingListener, SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragment.SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragmentExceptionHandler, SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragment.SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogListener

    public class CrimeDetailActivity
extends CrimeActivityBase<CrimeSummaryDetailed>
    CrimeDetailActivity is the activity class to display the detailed statistics for a given crime.

    The crime data type used to hold the information for the statistics is CrimeSummaryDetailed.

    The given crime is identified by its TSK identifier.

    Author:
    Tom
